analysis.description:
SecCrowdSale.start (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#278-280) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(startTime == 0)

Reentrancy in SecCrowdSale.BuyTokenSafe (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#281-294):
	External calls:
	- SECCoin.transfer(beneficiary,SecToSend) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#286-287)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- SECCoinSold (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#291-292)

SecCrowdSale.BuyTokenSafe (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#281-294) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-SECCoin.transfer(beneficiary,SecToSend) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#286-287)

SecCrowdSale.finishSafe (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#295-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-SECCoin.transfer(burner,remains) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol)

Reentrancy in SecCrowdSale.BuyTokenSafe (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#281-294):
	External calls:
	- SECCoin.transfer(beneficiary,SecToSend) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#286-287)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- etherReceived (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#289-290)

Reentrancy in SecCrowdSale.finishSafe (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol#295-301):
	External calls:
	- remains = SECCoin.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol)
	- SECCoin.transfer(burner,remains) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- owner.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdSaleClosed (/unique_chucks/27/0x9be0754df1f8ebf8d6a6fc86e0bf186aa3f7a4f4.sol)
